## HALALStake class

Represents a user's HALAL stake and accrued gains.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class HALALStake 
```

## Remarks

Returned by the [getHALALStake()](./lib-base.readableliquity.gethalalstake.md) function.

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `HALALStake` class.

|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [collateralGain](./lib-base.halalstake.collateralgain.md) |  | [Decimal](./lib-base.decimal.md) | Collateral gain available to withdraw. |
|  [isEmpty](./lib-base.halalstake.isempty.md) |  | boolean |  |
|  [stakedHALAL](./lib-base.halalstake.stakedhalal.md) |  | [Decimal](./lib-base.decimal.md) | The amount of HALAL that's staked. |
|  [usdhGain](./lib-base.halalstake.usdhgain.md) |  | [Decimal](./lib-base.decimal.md) | USDH gain available to withdraw. |
